rooms.description: Open entrance hall with colonial style detailing, incorporating Vastu principles by aligning the entrance in the auspicious direction.
Spacious living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light and ventilation. Colonial aesthetic with built-in seating alcoves.
Dining area adjacent to the living room, designed with colonial style detailing and Vastu alignments ensuring balance and energy flow.

Functional kitchen integrated into the ground floor plan with a dedicated servant's quarters door for service staff access. Colonial design elements with floor-to-ceiling windows enhancing ventilation.
Guest bathroom with colonial fixtures and Vastu-aligned positioning to support privacy and positive energy flow.
Compact living area for servant quarters, strategically located for easy access to kitchen and common areas. Colonial style with budget-friendly finishes.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring maximum light; designed according to Vastu for proper sunlight and energy flow.
Large colonial-style entrance door positioned in the favorable direction as per Vastu principles.
Additional floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural light and ventilation; designed in accordance with local building norms and budget constraints.

garden_details.description: Large garden area surrounding the cottage, featuring native plants and a colonial-inspired landscaping design that enhances privacy and energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.

levels.budget_considerations: Design elements are selected to adhere to budget constraints while incorporating necessary aesthetic details and functional spaces. Cost-effective materials and finishes are prioritized.
